question: Which among the following is a correct meaning of office of Qazi-ul-Quzat under the Mughals?
explanation: Chief judge of the empire Qazi-ul-Quzat was the supreme authority in justice. Since it was difficult for the emperor to do-away with justice in all the cases, he appointed Qazi-ul-Quzat to do the justice in accordance with Muslim Law. The Chief Judge of t
